mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS id, username, cipher_iv, verification_secret AS ciphered_verification_secret, verification_salt AS ciphered_verification_salt FROM "user" WHERE username = #{userName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "user" ( username, cipher_iv, verification_secret, verification_salt ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{cipherIv}, #{cipheredVerificationSecret}, #{cipheredVerificationSalt} )
